title: Snowdown shirt already retired?

embed.description: Time to get Freljord Festive in the limited red edition! These patterns will get everyone around you in the spirit of Snowdown.

body: Saw the new merch thingy when Snowdown reveal happened, is this shirt sold out or was it available before the  event and I missed out or any other reason as to why it's  retired?

replies.body: Aye, it looks like they're going quick.  ><  The blue one is still available, though!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=PY1fT8jy,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-12T21:26:42.380+0000)
>
> Aye, it looks like they're going quick.  ><  The blue one is still available, though!

I want to buy the blue one but my size isn't available. Is this limited availability or will there be a restock? Thanks!
